description: Sets tags (key and value pairs) to the assessment template that is specified by the ARN of the assessment template.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the assessment template that you want to set tags to.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A collection of key and value pairs that you want to set to the assessment template. (dict) --- A key and value pair. This data type is used as a request parameter in the  SetTagsForResource action and a response element in the  ListTagsForResource action. A tag key. value (string) --- A value assigned to a tag key.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A value assigned to a tag key.
